class.name: BlipKitWaveform
class.brief_description: Defines a waveform consisting of amplitude values.

method.name: create_with_frames
method.description: Creates a waveform and set its amplitudes to the given [param frames]. If [param normalize] is [code]false[/code], values of [param frames] are clamped between [code]-1.0[/code] and [code]+1.0[/code]. If [param normalize] is [code]true[/code], values of [param frames] are normalized between negative and positive [param amplitude]. [param amplitude] is clamped between [code]0.0[/code] and [code]1.0[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] The number of frames must be between [code]2[/code] and [code]64[/code].

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the waveform was initialized with frames.

method.name: set_frames
method.description: Set the waveform's amplitudes. If [param normalize] is [code]false[/code], values of [param frames] are clamped between [code]-1.0[/code] and [code]+1.0[/code]. If [param normalize] is [code]true[/code], values of [param frames] are normalized between negative and positive [param amplitude]. [param amplitude] is clamped between [code]0.0[/code] and [code]1.0[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] The number of frames must be between [code]2[/code] and [code]64[/code].

method.name: size
method.description: Returns the number of frames in the waveform.
